GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/user_ideas.description: retrieves an array of all user generated date ideas/events on the app
queries: sort_by (optional - location, price, type defaults to location)
order (option defaults to desc) asc or desc

exampleResponse.title: Jacuzzi
exampleResponse.description: From the outside Jacuzzi gives very little indication of the opulence and scale inside. Set out over four floors, the interiors merge lush, red banquettes and chairs with gold candlesticks and light fittings alongside white tablecloths, Italian art and fairy lights dotted throughout a veritable rainforest of greenery. If you‚Äôre looking for fancy restaurants in London that still have a bit of a sense of humour to them, Jacuzzi wouldn‚Äôt be a terrible place to start. Highlights include a Sicilian mezzanine on the third floor with a retractable roof and glitter ball disco toilets in the basement

GET /api/user_ideas/:_id.description: Retrieves user idea by idea id

idea.title: Glitterfest
idea.address: Between the Bridges The Queen's Walk London SE1
idea.description: Glitterfest is back! Our last party of the summer season at Between The Bridges! For one day only and we`ll be turning up the heat at our Glitterfest Summer Closing Party and bringing you festival vibes as we take Glitterfest to the next level. This is a mini festival with free glitter makeup, crazy confetti cannons, cocktails, street food, spectacular dancers & performers + non-stop vibes as our DJs play the hottest RNB, Hip Hop, Bashment & Garage üéâüçπüî•

GET /api/search.description: search events for a specific location and get an array of events back of that location
queries: location (any city), sort_by (price, type), order (asc or desc) no queries defaults to location desc

exampleResponse.title: Masicka
exampleResponse.address: Bowlers Exhibition Centre Longbridge Road Stretford M17 1SN
exampleResponse.description: Are you ready to immerse yourselves in an unforgettable, authentic dancehall music vibe? We are happy to invite you to the most anticipated reggae dancehall event of the year! Get ready to experience pure euphoria as we present Masicka in Manchester. This will be a spectacular concert event, featuring world-renowned entertainers and surprise guests. These live performances will leave you hungry for more! Save the date and prepare to be captivated by a diverse lineup of sensational performers. DJs Include: DJ Killa Filla - Hurricane Jermaine - Classique Sound - Bizzy Movements - Dj Deo - Dj Koko

exampleResponse.title: Discos for Grown Ups pop-up 70s, 80s & 90s disco party
exampleResponse.address: Lowther Pavilion Lowther Terrace Lytham Saint Annes FY8 5QQ
exampleResponse.description: After our amazing sold out disco in April, we are bringing the legendary Discos for Grown ups back to the Lowther Pavilion on Saturday 9th September. Get glittered up for a feel good, fun and fabulous night of dancing with people your own age to the best ever 70s soul and disco, 80s pop and 90s dance anthems. Boogie the night away to dance floor classics from Donna Summer, Earth Wind and Fire, Chic, Human League, Sister Sledge, Billy Ocean, Black Box, Barry White, Odyssey, Chaka Khan, ABBA, Madonna, Robin S, Erasure, Bee Gees, Candi Staton, Faithless and many more...

exampleResponse.title: Lola Lo Manchester
exampleResponse.address: Lola Lo Manchester, Arches 9 & 10, Whitworth West, M1 5LH
exampleResponse.description: A tiki-tavern where raucous parties reign supreme, Lola Lo is Manchester club and party bar brimming with luscious cocktails, late-night cocktail artisans and dance floors. A 560 capacity venue containing three levels: a lower ground floor, a ground floor and a mezzanine, creating a multiple-tiered tiki paradise. With DJs playing in the evenings and through the night, exotic, beach-themed drinks and live entertainment, Lola Lo breathes a fresh vibrancy into the Deansgate Locks scene. Additional unique features such as a secret selfie room and a casual dining operation. Lola Lo Manchester has an exotic edge on the existing bars on the Locks.

POST /api/users/.description: create a new user on this endpoint

POST /api/user_ideas/.description: create a new user idea on this endpoint

requestBody.title: maldives sunny resort
requestBody.description: The Maldives, a tropical paradise nestled in the Indian Ocean, is a mesmerizing archipelago composed of 26 coral atolls and over 1,000 idyllic islands. Famous for its crystal-clear turquoise waters, pristine white-sand beaches, and luxurious overwater villas, the Maldives beckons travelers with its postcard-perfect beauty. A mecca for water enthusiasts, this enchanting destination offers exceptional snorkeling, scuba diving, and an abundance of marine life, including colorful coral reefs and exotic fish. Whether you seek a romantic escape, thrilling water adventures, or simply a serene retreat, the Maldives promises an unforgettable and indulgent experience in a picture-perfect tropical setting.

PATCH /api/users/:username.description: Updates a user details using their username

PATCH /api/user_ideas/:_id.description: Updates a user idea using the idea id

DELETE /api/users/:username.description: Deletes the user by unique username

DELETE /api/user_ideas/:_id.description: Deletes a date idea by idea id
